Around this time, Darwin’s father learned that Darwin did not want to become a doctor.

Charles is spending all his time traveling

and hunting.

At this rate,

he’ll end up being a lazy good-for-nothing.

Does it hurt

when I press here?

Yes.

Charles says he has no intention whatsoever of becoming a doctor.

Ow!

Have Charles

return home

at once!

Yes, Father.

What!

36
